about_the_game:
Includes:
500 Rogue Bucks

Year 1 Pass:
- Kestrel, Seeker, Mack, Switchblade, Runway, Cannon, Umbra and Glimpse
- 500 Rogue Bucks
- North Star Phantom Legendary Outfit
- Iced Out Primary Weapon Wrap
- Iced Out Secondary Weapon Wrap
- Iced Out Melee Wrap
- Jackal Avatar
- Jackal Banner
- Jackal Border

Rogue Edition:
- 8 Rogues
- 500 Rogue Bucks

name: Rogue Company - Ultimate Edition

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core i5-2320
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 555
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 3.20 ghz 12
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960

short_description: Save the Day, Look Good, and Get Paid with the Ultimate Edition of Rogue Company. This bundle has everything you need from year one of Rogue Company.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
